CHAT.comment: At this meal were Chi , MOT , and Chi's younger Sis. The radio was on very loudly in the background throughout the taping session , making the speakers very hard to hear. There was very minimal conversation between Mot , Chi , and Sis. They talked about routine , mundane things. Chi and Sis would ask Mot if they could do something and Mot would reply , MOT at one point asked Sis if she had taken her medicine , and so on. Towards the end of the session , SIS called her friend on the phone.

u.a: aft sounds of Chi getting up from the table , getting something from the kitchen maybe , and bringing it back to the table
aft loud bang as something is probably dropped on the table
this may be a quote from a cereal commercial
loud sounds in the background make this utterance hard to understand
towards the end of the pause , someone gets up from the table and rustles a plastic bag; Mot may be calling a family dog in this utterance

aft strange rhythmic sounds which may be a person mixing something in a bowl , followed by strange , banging and other sounds throughout the following pause <obviously , there is some activity going on , but I can not tell what it might be>
aft Chi probably gets up from the table because in his next utterances he sounds far away from the table
aft very loud sound which may be a cough or something being dropped
MOT and Chi quietly discuss something briefly which is almost completely masked by the radio
SIS talks to Crystal briefly on the phone
continues to talk on the phone for one utterance
tells Crystal what Mot said and talks some more
